review: My only real gripe is that it forces you to watch a roughly 5 minute long introductory video every time the device is registered, and that seems to happen any time they push new firmware to it.  The firmware update erases all settings, so you have to re-connect to your Wifi, re-enter your Amazon account credentials, then watch the same annoying 5 minute long video before you can actually start doing anything with it.  They really should allow you to skip that video, but none of the buttons on the remote let you do anything other than go back and log into a different Amazon account and then start watching the video again.Whenever that video starts I just mute my TV and leave for a few minutes.  But it's kind of annoying to even have to do that...
author: Bruce

review: This thing is awesome. I have had it for a couple weeks now and I am still finding new things to do with it. The Fire TV Stick has opened up a whole new area of t.v. viewing, even better than the Google Chromecast, which I also have.I highly recommend this to everyone. it is easy to set up and use.
